sections.content:
||**“Leave the feelings to the girls that's what they do. We act.”**||
•


                                                                                                                                                                                           

> **Congratulations, you completed** <#1143365275656405013>.
> 
> 
> On to the next channel <#1145895294760919142>.

📽️ **Crypto Introduction** 📽️ 

"The Gateway To A New World"

Are you ready to enter the Gateway To A New World?

A Fuck yea

•


🍼 **Tutorials** 🍼 

**Tutorials 1** **-** The benefits of Investing!

Does crypto generate you an income? Does crypto replace your job?

A No -
B Yes

•




**Tutorials 2** **-** Your success guaranteed if you understand these things:

You can succeed at anything if you:

A Never quit and become super skilled at what we know works -
B Jump from thing to thing because you're easily distracted
C Follow whats currently popular, just like everyone else
D Become emotional and impatient that you didn't make $100k in 3.5 weeks

•




**Tutorials 3** **-** Stop being blind to the truth and start thinking like an elite professional.

If you want to learn what actually makes you money you must:

A Cry
B Learn what everyone else already knows
C Complain
D Progress to the more advanced lessons -

•




**Tutorials 4** **-** First we need to protect you from SCAMS

How do you become a professional and avoid gambling like a degenerate?

A The spirits of the universe will guide me
B By guessing, because using your brain is hard
C By buying NFT's
D By studying the lessons every day -

•




**Tutorials 5** **-** Important information for young G's

To invest in crypto under 18 you must use:

A Fraud to open an account
B Excuses to avoid making an account
C A custodial app, or your parents account -

•




**Tutorials 6** **-** Unlock unlimited knowledge from other people:

**What do good questions look like?**

❌ **Thoughts on XRP?**
✅ Using the analysis taught in investing lesson #8, I believe XRP is a good buy. Here is my work... Did I apply the lessons correctly?

❌ **Where do I go?**
✅ I have searched channels 1, 2, 3 and cannot find this specific thing I'm looking for. Am I missing the #campus-map, or a recommended pathway diagram?

**Ask questions:**
> Specifically
> With all relevant details
> While keeping it short

The effort you put into your questions is:

A Not important
B  Something which can be winged
C Super important -
D Meh

•




**Tutorials 7** **-** The secret to rapid development is not just information, its PEOPLE
**

By doing lessons and unlocking more advanced chats, you:

A Jump from thing to thing because you're easily distracted
B Gain the knowledge and motivation of more advanced students in the community -
C Become emotional and impatient that you didn't make $100k in 3.5 weeks
D Follow whats currently popular on tiktok, just like everyone else

•


🍼 **Tutorials Conclusion** 🍼 

**Tutorials 8 -** Next Steps:

🌟 Great, I've finished the tutorials! 🌟 

**What do I do next?**

If you're a beginner, follow the map and proceed to **Beginners Toolbox**

"But I'm already experienced!"

If you're experienced, skip the Beginners Toolbox and go straight to the **Fundamental Lessons**
**Simple Signals** are unlocked **after** the **Fundamental lessons!**

This is the order of the **Crypto Campus**

Lessons:
1. Tutorials (you are here)
2. Beginners Toolbox
3. Fundamentals
4. Investing Lessons (you unlock advanced signals here)
5. Crypto Investing Masterclass

How do you gain access to more signals?

A Give a good signal in the chats to students
B Complete the Fundamental Lessons -
C Message the Professors
D Showing us your Crypto portfolio balance

What do you do if you get lost?

A Panic
b Show everyone your favorite crypto coin
C Spam all the chats
D Check the campus map or ask for help in the #network channel -
